about_the_game:
Game Player is designed to win if you drive a motorcycle (motor cycle) along an urban road to kill or destroy the target and occupy the target point (GOAL).

The killing or destruction of the target is displayed as a score in the upper left corner of the screen.

Targets are enemy motorcycles and monsters moving with trucks, monsters around the road, and aircraft attacking from the air. If you kill or destroy them, your score will increase.

On the other hand, if you are shot by an enemy motorcycle (motor cycle) or an aircraft, fire or collide with a police car driving on the road, or collide with a truck, your score will be reduced.

If the score is more than 100 points after increasing and decreasing the score, you can go to the GOAL.

There are a lot of turrets installed at the GOAL, so if you didn't get 10 shields, the player would be killed by the turret's bullets.

[Tips to win the game]

When acquiring a shield, it is expected that the score will be reduced due to the shooting of the enemy, so it is recommended to focus on obtaining a shield from a score of 150 or more.

A grenade (bomb) can be increased and used by one for every 10 targets killed or destroyed by firing, and if you use it when enemies flock, the score will increase quickly.

[Keyboard operation and game rules]

If you run the game, you will be able to tour the road and show the target point before starting the game, and the keyboard description and game rule will appear on the screen. Press the "L" key on the keyboard to change to English/Korean/Japanese/Chinese.

[game start]

Press the "Enter" key on the keyboard to start.

name: motorcycle combat
short_description: The game is designed to drive a motorcycle and kill or destroy targets along city roads, occupying the Goal, allowing the game player to win. You need more than 100 points and 10 shields to win.
